messages.400: The request wasn't quite right. Like a wave that didn't break properly, something in the format needs adjustment.
messages.401: You'll need to sign in first. Think of it as needing a beach pass to access this particular shore.
messages.402: This content requires payment. Even the most beautiful beaches have their admission fees.
messages.403: This area is restricted. Some shores are private, and this happens to be one of them.
messages.404: The page you're looking for seems to have drifted away with the tide. It may have moved, or perhaps it never existed here.
messages.405: That approach won't work here. Try a different method, like choosing another path along the shoreline.
messages.406: The format requested isn't available. Sometimes the beach doesn't have the amenities you're looking for.
messages.408: Your request took too long. Like waiting for the perfect wave, sometimes timing matters.
messages.409: There's a conflict with your request. Two waves colliding, creating an unexpected disturbance.
messages.410: This content has been permanently removed. Like footprints washed away by the tide, it's gone forever.
messages.413: Your request is too large. Even the ocean has its limits on what it can carry.
messages.429: You're making requests too quickly. Slow down and enjoy the rhythm of the waves.
messages.500: Something went wrong on our end. Even the calmest seas can have unexpected currents.
messages.502: We're having trouble connecting. The lighthouse signal isn't reaching the ships properly.
messages.503: The service is temporarily unavailable. The tide is out, but it will return.
messages.504: The connection timed out. The message didn't reach the distant shore in time.
messages.default: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

descriptions.400: Check your request and try again with the correct format.
descriptions.401: Please log in to access this content.
descriptions.403: If you believe you should have access, please contact support.
descriptions.404: Perhaps try returning to the homepage, or let the waves guide you back.
descriptions.405: Try using a different method to access this resource.
descriptions.406: Request a different format that we support.
descriptions.409: Refresh and try again to resolve the conflict.
descriptions.410: This content is no longer available anywhere.
descriptions.413: Try reducing the size of your request.
descriptions.429: Take a moment to breathe, then try again in a few moments.
descriptions.500: We're working to resolve this. Please try again shortly.
descriptions.502: The connection between servers failed. Please try again.
descriptions.503: We're temporarily down for maintenance. Please check back soon.
descriptions.504: The server didn't respond in time. Please try again.
descriptions.default: Perhaps try returning to the homepage.

footers.400: Every mistake is a chance to learn
footers.402: Good things are worth waiting for
footers.404: Not all who wander are lost
footers.503: Rest is part of the journey
